Itachi casts a [[wikipedia:crow|crow]] genjutsu while Kisame creates numerous water sharks that jump over and onto the opponent.

== Trivia ==
* A {{translation|[[wikipedia:Yaksha|Yaksha]]|夜叉|Yasha}} is a spirit that watches over the treasures hidden in the earth and tree roots.

[[es:Genjutsu: Yaksha Tiburones y Aves]]
